name.th: ผู้ช่วย AI WhatsAsk

short.ar: يدمج الذكاء الاصطناعي (مثل Gemini) مع WhatsApp Web للإجابة على الأسئلة حول المحادثات
short.bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Integrate AI (like Gemini) with WhatsApp Web to ask questions about the conversations.
short.bn: কথোপকথন সম্পর্কে প্রশ্ন করার জন্য AI (যেমন Gemini) কে WhatsApp Web এর সাথে একীভূত করে।
short.de: Integriert KI (wie Gemini) in WhatsApp Web, um Fragen zu Unterhaltungen zu stellen.
short.es: Integra IA (como Gemini) con WhatsApp Web para hacer preguntas sobre las conversaciones.
short.fil: I-integrate ang AI (tulad ng Gemini) sa WhatsApp Web para sa pag-analyze ng iyong mga chat.
short.fr: Intègre l'IA (comme Gemini) dans WhatsApp Web pour poser des questions sur vos conversations.
short.hi: WhatsApp वेब के साथ AI (जैसे Gemini) को एकीकृत करें ताकि बातचीत के बारे में प्रश्न पूछ सकें।
short.id: Integrasikan AI (seperti Gemini) dengan WhatsApp Web untuk menganalisis percakapan Anda.
short.it: Integra l'IA (come Gemini) in WhatsApp Web per fare domande sulle tue conversazioni.
short.ja: AI（Geminiなど）をWhatsApp Webと統合して、会話について質問できます。
short.ko: WhatsApp Web에 AI(Gemini 등)를 통합하여 대화에 대해 질문할 수 있습니다.
short.ms: Integrasikan AI (seperti Gemini) dengan WhatsApp Web untuk menganalisis perbualan anda.
short.nl: Integreer AI (zoals Gemini) met WhatsApp Web om vragen te stellen over gesprekken.
short.pl: Integruj AI (jak Gemini) z WhatsApp Web do analizy Twoich czatów
short.pt_BR: Integre a IA (como Gemini) ao WhatsApp Web para fazer perguntas sobre suas conversas.
short.ru: Интегрируйте ИИ (например, Gemini) с WhatsApp Web для анализа ваших бесед.
short.sw: Huunganisha Akili Bandia (kama Gemini) na WhatsApp Web ili kujibu maswali kuhusu mazungumzo
short.th: ผสานรวม AI (เช่น Gemini) กับ WhatsApp Web เพื่อวิเคราะห์การสนทนาของคุณ
short.tr: Sohbetlerinizi analiz etmek için Yapay Zekayı (Gemini gibi) WhatsApp Web ile entegre edin.
short.uk: Інтегруйте ШІ (як Gemini) з WhatsApp Web для аналізу ваших чатів
short.vi: Tích hợp AI (như Gemini) với WhatsApp Web để phân tích cuộc trò chuyện của bạn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsAsk is an adorable AI assistant to help you write new messages on Whatsapp or look for information in your chat history.

INTRODUCTION
Use WhatsAsk on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Go to Whatsapp web and refresh the page
3. Open a conversation and click the Gemini icon in the chat toolbar. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

PRIVACY POLICY
Our extensions do NOT collect any information about you or your messages.

We use Google APIs (Google Gemini 1.5 Flash) to analyse chat messages. Your data is anonymised by default (names replaced by 'User', passwords, email addresses, card numbers, SSN and phone numbers are deleted before using Google AI services).
Consult Google IA services privacy policy here: https://support.google.com/gemini/answer/13594961?hl=en

Version 1.2:
- Empty conversation bug fix
